title: TFW your brother's children find out that you also play league

replies.body: I kinda hope this starts happening to me with nieces and nephews soon. Feels like a cool way to connect with a younger generation.

hell yes man, being a genx is pretty cool in that we get to be one of the first waves of people that get to connect with other generations through video gaming in the same way that my dad and grandfather connected with me over sports.

just dont be like me and try to segue a convo about sharing kills into one about wealth redistribution  {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
I thought kids only played Fortnite now?
aye maybe thats the problem, just too damn many of em
My favorite part is the "Music âš¡ Band" T-shirt.
I resemble this. LOL.  I attended school with dirt.  We were both just innocent kids.  I think Dirt and I are the same age.

Now give us one for when your brother's kids do nothing but play league all day and they're all plat+ but you're a casual with a job and kids and responsibilities and can't be bothered to climb out of Bronze hell so you don't want to give them your summoner name because you're afraid of getting clowned by your 17 year old nephew.
